_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 second channel that will plant a grove upon the camp. Placing a grove costs [[0]] and 90-0 (levels 1-18) mana. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.
Ivern cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.
The grove matures over 40 âˆ’ 1 (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can target the camp again to free it after a 0.5-second cast time, clearing the camp and receiving the full gold and full experience bounties. Using Smite on a monster within the grove will instantly free the camp regardless of maturity.
If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a grove, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.
Starting at level 5, freeing the Red Brambleback or the Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied champion to gain the camp's respective buff, either the Crest of Cinders or the Crest of Insight, for a reduced 90 seconds(bug). If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.

Ivern conjures a vine dealing [[0]] and [[1]] the first enemy hit for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds. Allies that Attack a [[2]] enemy dash into attack range.

[[3]] Ivern dashes directly onto the [[4]] enemy.

[[0]] While in brush and for 3 seconds after leaving it Ivern's Attacks deal an additional [[1]]. Nearby allies will gain this effect for 1.5 seconds and deal [[2]].

[[3]] Ivern grows a patch of Brush reveiling the area for 8 seconds. The Brush persists until Ivern's team loses vision within it, or up to 45 seconds.

Ivern grants [[0]] to an ally champion. After 2 seconds, it bursts, dealing [[1]] and [[2]] enemies by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds. If [[3]] detonates and no enemy champions are hit while the shield still persists, the ally will be shielded for [[4]] for 2 seconds

Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for 45 seconds. If Daisy Attacks the same champion three consecutive times she creates a shockwave, dealing [[0]] and [[1]] enemies for 1 second (3s Cooldown).

Daisy has:
[[2]]
[[3]]
[[4]]
[[5]]

[[6]] Manually issue orders to Daisy.
